name: MEC Aquanator Jacket - Infants
description:
A little rain shouldn't prevent little funhogs from getting outside. The fully waterproof-breathable fabric on the Aquanator Jacket ensures dryness through wet and windy conditions. The relaxed silhouette easily fits over several warm layers and can be worn as just a light jacket as conditions require.Shell is abrasion-resistant 75-denier polyester with a polyurethane waterproof-breathable coating and a DWR (durable water repellency) finish.Fully lined with polyester mesh that slides well over a fleece or sweatshirt and is soft against skin when worn over a T-shirt.Storm flap over zipper keeps weather out.Elasticized cuffs seal out the cold and damp.Reflective details for low-light visibility.Name tag so you know whose is whose.

Regular fit



Fit guide

Technical garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Tight, with no room to spare.





Very close fit, with a bit of room.





Generous, but not oversized.





Oversized with lots of room for layers.


All MEC men’s and boy’s pants are regular rise.
